sec.p: Phytochemical analysis was carried out by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry to determine the chemical composition of MPE. A total of 22 metabolites were identified. The chemical formulas and mass of the detected compounds chromatogram are presented in Table 1 and Figure 1.

div.p: Phytochemical constituents of Mentha piperita essential oil by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry analysis
Chromatogram of Mentha piperita essential oil
